ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s not just the funniest game youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve ever playedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

Ã¢â‚¬Â¦itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s also the most infamous video game of all time!

Leisure Suit Larry in the Land of the Lounge Lizards was first released by Sierra On-Line in 1987 and be-came an international phenomenon. The lovable loser Larry Laffer -- a 40-year-old virgin in pursuit of losing his virÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.um, finding true love -- and risquÃƒÂ© humor were unlike anything anyone had ever seen or played.

Now LarryÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s original creator, the world-famous game designer Al Lowe, has teamed up with Sierra Vet-eran Josh Mandel, to bring this amazing, perverted game back to life Ã¢â‚¬â€œ updated and expanded in every way imaginable! All we kept from the original game is the plot. EVERYTHING else is fresh and new including:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Incredibly lush new high-res graphics! Explore all the seedy sights and sounds of Lost Wages, where fortunes and reputations go to die!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A brand new musical score by Grammy-nominated and BAFTA Award-winning composer Austin Wintory! Fresh from completing the musical score to Journey (available for download on the PS3), Austin composed the best music Leisure Suit Larry has ever heard!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Everything in the game was rebuilt from the ground up, including all hand-painted backgrounds, characters, and state-of-the-art 2D animation!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Thousands of hilarious new lines, gags, jokes, and dialogues, written by AlÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s old Sierra partner, Josh Mandel (aka the voice of King Graham from KingÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Quest)!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New characters, new locations, new puzzles, and a major new love interest for Larry!
WhatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s more, Leisure Suit Larry: Reloaded is the first major game to be released with funding by Kick-starter! Over 14,000 fans chipped in to bring Larry back to life!
Will Larry find true love? Will Lost Wages ever be the same? And will YOU want to play any other comedy adventure once youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve played Leisure Suit Larry: Reloaded?
ThereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s only one way to find out!

What's New 
!!! Your old game saves will not be compatible with this new version !!!
